publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6890 Jackie Baillie: 50 Years of Alcoholics Anonymous in Dumbarton and Districtâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Dumbarton and District Alcoholics Anonymous (AA) group on its 50th anniversary; notes that the AA is a vital source of help for men and women recovering from alcoholism to share their experience, strength and hope with each other; understands that a public information meeting is scheduled to be held on Wednesday 8 September 2010 in the Denny Civic Theatre, Dumbarton, which will inform people about the work of the AA, and commends all those involved in offering a lifeline to people struggling with an alcohol addiction. Supported by: James Kelly*, Kenneth Gibson*, Mary Mulligan*, Jamie McGrigor*, Pauline McNeill*, Robin Harper*, Stuart McMillan*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-6890 50 Years of Alcoholics Anonymous in Dumbarton and District (lodged on 1 September 2010) Trish Godman*
S3M-6890 50 Years of Alcoholics Anonymous in Dumbarton and District (lodged on 1 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*
